last_episode_to_air.name: If I Ruled the World
last_episode_to_air.overview: Aliyah devises a plan to reveal the truth of New Babyl during the Exemplar finals, but Authority Phydra is closing in on her, determined to stop Aliyah at all costs.

name: Utopia Falls
overview: In a genre bending take on a coming of age story, a group of teens in a distant future colony uncover an ancient forbidden archive of historical, cultural and musical relics. This discovery forces them to question everything they've been taught, and use the power of music to ignite change in their reality to expose the truth.

episodes.name: The World Is Yours
episodes.overview: In the last living colony on Earth, New Babyl, Aliyah, a candidate in the stateâ€™s Exemplar entertainment competition, stumbles upon a discovery known as The Archive, a find that will change her world forever.

episodes.name: Can I Kick It
episodes.overview: Aliyah discovers a connection between The Archive and her late mother while an impromptu performance tests the patience of those in power.

episodes.name: 99 Problems
episodes.overview: While Phydra interrogates Bohdi about his hip-hop inspired performance, Aliyah leads her fellow Exemplar Candidates in a civil rights movement inspired protest against Bohdi's unjust imprisonment.

episodes.name: Run This Town
episodes.overview: Aliyah and her friends look towards hip-hop for inspiration for the upcoming Exemplar group round, while in The Archive, Tempo uncovers humanity's forgotten dark history.

episodes.name: Lose Control
episodes.overview: Aliyah, Apollo, Bohdi, and Brooklyn venture to the edge of New Babyl to see if there is life beyond the shield. Back at Reform sector, Sage and Mags find themselves caught in a riot between the Authority and angry citizens.

episodes.name: Hate Me Now
episodes.overview: Aliyah and the Exemplar candidates all struggle with a new reality as they come to terms with how their actions have resulted in a Tribunal backlash.

episodes.name: Lost Ones
episodes.overview: Authority Phydra seeks to root out those connected to The Archive while Aliyah glimpses strange visitors to New Babyl.

episodes.name: The Light
episodes.overview: As the Exemplar semifinals approach, Aliyah learns an earth-shattering secret about New Babyl.

episodes.name: Worst Behaviour
episodes.overview: Bohdi and Aliyah join a covert rebel group in New Babyl while Phydra hunts down a mole in the Tribunal.

episodes.name: If I Ruled the World
episodes.overview: Aliyah devises a plan to reveal the truth of New Babyl during the Exemplar finals, but Authority Phydra is closing in on her, determined to stop Aliyah at all costs.
